title: New Device
blocks: How does it feel just to be alive?
How does it feel just to leave me dead?
and you can't wait till I'll find it
how does it feel just to be alive?
How does it feel just to leave me dead?
And now the time is up and you're too late
and we will not forget you
You push it hard and you suck em dry
You push it hard till you're left for dead
And you can't wait till I'll find it
You push it hard and you suck em dry
You push it hard till you're left for dead
And now the call is up and it's too late
and we will not forget you
